name: Sniper Scope
description: Doom with a sniper scope! I attatched it to the shotgun, so when you have the shotgun equipped, press z to actiate sniper mode, and press x or change to another weapon to deactivate it. NOTE: This will only work properly in OpenGL mode. The Field-of-View change does not work in software mode, so you will not get the cool zoom-in effect.
